title: How many wars did the Ottoman Empire win, and how many did they lose? - Quora

response.answer_text: I've got a list of wars they fought (lots of wars of succession due to Janissaries taking over) Conquest of the Byzantines - Victory War with Serbia - Victory Bulgarian War - Victory War with Hungary - Victory 1st War with Venice - Victory War with Moldavia - Victory War with Poland - Stalemate War with the Mamluks - Stalemate War with Croatia - Victory 2nd War with Venice - Victory War with Mamluks - Victory War with the Habsburgs - Defeat Safavid War - Ottoman Victory 3rd War with Venice — Victory Conflicts with Portugal - Indecisive Siege of Malta - Defeat War with Russia - Defeat 4th War with Venice - Victory 2nd War with Poland - Indecisive War with Austria - Victory 3rd War with Poland - Victory 2nd War with Russia - Indecisive 3rd War with Russia - Victory 5th War with Venice - Victory 2nd War with Austria - Stalemate 4th War with Russia - Defeat 5th War with Russia - Defeat 3rd War with Austria - Defeat War with Persia - Defeat 4th War with Austria - Indecisive 6th War with Russia - Defeat 7th War with Russia - Defeat War with the Saudis - Victory 8th War with Russia - Defeat War with Egypt - Defeat 9th War with Russia - Defeat War with Greece - Victory War with Italy - Defeat Balkan War - Defeat World War I - Defeat 2nd War with Greece - Victory Turkish War of Independence - Defeat There are a lot of other wars but this has some of the more important ones. Out of these 42 wars the Ottomans won 19. Most if their victories were early on as they had more centralized resources, but they suffered the same problems as the Romans, too much territory and not enough soldiers or money.
